verses.name: Jeremiah 51:30
verses.text: The mighty men of Babylon have forborn to fight, they have remained in their holds: their might hath failed; they became as women: they have burned her dwellingplaces; her bars are broken.

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:31
verses.text: One post shall run to meet another, and one messenger to meet another, to shew the king of Babylon that his city is taken at one end,

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:32
verses.text: And that the passages are stopped, and the reeds they have burned with fire, and the men of war are affrighted.
